thread.title: VIDEO: Man City starlet scores stunning goal for U23 side
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Man City starlet scores stunning goal for U23 side

title: VIDEO: Man City starlet scores stunning goal for U23 side
text:
0 Mar 4, 2017 11:49:18 The youngster has impressed for the youth team in recent weeks and scored another solo goal worthy of the praise he is receiving 
Manchester City have a plethora of young talent at the Etihad Stadium at present, with Jadon Sancho one young man firmly regarded as a hot prospect for the future. 
On Friday, he scored a goal that further underlined his potential. 
Ozil ruled out of Liverpool clash 
Having recieved the ball to the left of the goal in an Under-23 tie against Sunderland, Sancho, donned in a short-sleeved shirt and gloves, weaved into the Black Cats' penalty box with a quickfire set of step-overs. 
He then curled the ball into the far corner of the net and celebrated with a nonchalent stroll. 
Watch the clip above now! Related
